title: Cody Simpson reveals the truth behind THAT racy selfie with girlfriend Miley Cyrus
text:
Cody Simpson continues to make headlines for his fast-moving romance with American songstress Miley Cyrus.

And on Tuesday, the Australian singer was asked to explain his recent eyebrow-raising photo, where he was seen with the Wrecking Ball hit-maker's hands down his pants, after the young couple had just got new tattoos in Los Angeles.

Appearing on KIIS FM'S Kyle and Jackie O show in Sydney, he said the saucy snap was just one of many taken on the day.

'I was so ready for it!' Cody Simpson has spoken about THAT racy selfie of girlfriend Miley Cyrus putting her hands down his pants

'We just got tatted there... She had that one on her arm and I had that one on my chest,' he explained as the photo got flashed up on the screen.

'I have the shirt open because I was getting the tatt done and we were taking this picture in the mirror.

'We took a few normal photos, but she put her hands in my pants and we just posted that one.'

'I was so comfortable, look at me, I was so ready for it!' Cody boasted about the cheeky moment as the image flashed up on a screen within the Sydney radio studio

Radio host Kyle Sandilands sarcastically asked: 'Did you get uncomfortable there?'

Cody laughed, adding with a smile: 'Do I look uncomfortable? I was so comfortable, look at me, I was so ready for it!'

He joked with a smirk: 'I was about to lay down or lay up, I don't know.'

It was to show off their new ink! Cody said the photo, which was also shared by Miley last week, was to show off the young couple's new tattoos they had done in Los Angeles

During the chat, he also joked about how his mother Angie had re-posted the racy photo on Instagram.

'The funniest thing about that was my mum re-storied it, I was like "Mum, you're posted a photo of me with my girlfriend's hands in my pants",' he laughed.

Giving her seal of approval of their new relationship, Angie also captioned the photo: 'Puts a smile on my dial to see you both so blissfully happy. #happyforyouguys.'

Miley commented with love-heart emojis, while her mother Tish wrote: 'Puts a smile on my face too!'

Having a laugh: Miley's mum Trish and his mum Angie publicly commented on the pair's blossoming romance

'They're very happy and very in love': The couple went public with their romance on October 4, just two months after Miley announced her separation from husband Liam Hemsworth

Cody and Miley went public with their romance on October 4, when they were spotted on a date in Los Angeles.

The pair have known each other since Cody dated model Gigi Hadid in 2014, but have only been dating a few weeks.

On a recent Instagram live stream, the said they first shared a kiss together in 2015 when they were both single.
description: Cody Simpson continues to make headlines for his fast-moving romance with American songstress Miley Cyrus. And on Tuesday, the Australian singer was asked to explain their recent racy photo.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
